IInputOperations IInputOperations Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.StreamAnalytics.dll

Operations for managing the input(s) of the stream analytics job.

Edit

In this Article

public interface IInputOperationsPublic Interface IInputOperations

Methods

BeginTestConnectionAsync(String, String, String, CancellationToken) BeginTestConnectionAsync(String, String, String, CancellationToken)

Edit

Test the connectivity of an input for a stream analytics job. Asynchronous call.

Task<ResourceTestConnectionResponse> BeginTestConnectionAsync(string resourceGroupName, string jobName, string inputName, CancellationToken cancellationToken)Function BeginTestConnectionAsync(resourceGroupName As String, jobName As String, inputName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of ResourceTestConnectionResponse)
Parameters
resourceGroupName
String String

The resource group name of the stream analytics job.

jobName
String String

The name of the stream analytics job.

inputName
String String

The name of the input for the stream analytics job.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns
Task<ResourceTestConnectionResponse> Task(Of ResourceTestConnectionResponse)

The test result of the input or output data source.
